page.title: 03Living in Rawdon
page.content: Most families have lived in the area for 15 to 20 yearsand reasons for moving here include being near work or relatives,or because they liked the houses.The most common reason given for liking Rawdon is that it provides the{best of both worlds,}being quiet and semi-rural with easy access to the motorways,Yorkshire Dales and the amenities of Bradford and Leeds.Rawdon village is said to be clean and tidy,retaining a{friendly small {community spirit,}though some complain of too much traffic travelling too fast.Popular features are good shops,schools and public transport,country walks and good facilities for children and the elderly.It is regarded as a healthy area with open fields and space and { {fresh air in abundance}.Many feel that more sports facilities are needed.
